FreeMarket: everything deserves a chance at a new life

WhatIsFreeMarketText.1: FreeMarket is a place where people can give items to others who are receiving social assistance. Give your unused items a new home and a new life! There’s satisfaction in seeing the faces of the people you are helping and connecting in your community. And there are always are people in our own neighborhood that are in need. Give your things a new life with people in your own community and help them with a chance at a better life.
WhatIsFreeMarketText.2: For social assistance recipients, FreeMarket is an easy way to search for free clothing, toys, household items, and other things that will make life a little easier.
WhatIsFreeMarketText.3: Give your unwanted things a new life with people in your own community and help them with a chance at a better life.

DonorsText: It’s easy! Simply create an account, post your items with a photo, and you are done. That’s it. Once a connection is made, arrange for collection. And you can search our Wishlist page to see what is really needed in the community that isn’t currently available.
RecipientsText: It’s easy! Create your account, complete our social assistance verification form, and then search the website for the things you need. If you need something that you can’t find, you can post to our Wishlist page.
HistoryText: We are going to write our history
